1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"The Prophet used to bring his head close to me when I was menstruaring and he was in I'tikaf (seclusion in a mosques for the purpose of worship), and I would wash it and comb his hair

chapter.ara-name: باب الْحَائِضِ تَتَنَاوَلُ الشَّىْءَ مِنَ الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: A menstruating woman taking something from the mosque
